p: Toxicity: In a phase I trial with 25 healthy subjects, curcumin up to 8000 mg/day for 3 months did not show any toxicity [ 136]. In an acute toxicity study, ethanolic extract of rhizome of C. longa at the doses of 0.5, 1.0 and 3.0 mg/kg did not cause any sign of toxicity in mice. Moreover, no toxicity was found at 100 mg/kg/day in the 90-day toxicity study in mice [ 137].
